title: Pay before tax

p1.workingOrNotice: Tell us your gross pay - before tax and other deductions. You’ll find this on your payslips.
p1.noLongerWorking: Tell us what your gross pay was - before tax and other deductions. You’ll find this on your payslips.

p2.workingOrNotice: If your gross pay changes on a regular basis (for example, if you have a zero-hours contract), use your last 3 months of payslips to work out your average gross pay.
p2.noLongerWorking: If your gross pay changed on a regular basis (for example, if you had a zero-hours contract), use your final 3 months of payslips to work out your average gross pay.

p3: Do not include any overtime payments.
